title: Retrieving staking balances in NEAR protocol
author: DearDeer DearDeer
description: How to retrieve "total amount staked" and "rewards earned" for a particular Near staking account? Ideally via an API.
cleaned_text: How to retrieve "total amount staked" and "rewards earned" for a particular Near staking account? Ideally via an API. Asked Modified [1 year, 5 months ago](?lastactivity) Viewed 375 times Add a comment | 1 Answer Call an archival rpc node on the staking pool smart contract with method_name get_account_total_balance, which will give you the staked }) In order to get the rewards earned, look at the balance for previous epochs ( every 12 hour ) and calculate the difference.
